name: Shift 2k20
description:
Demake made for 2kPlus jam 2020 by Maxime EUZIERE and Damien ALLONSIUS

Original game by Tony (Fishing Cactus): https://armorgames.com/play/751/shift

Original game's Steam release: Fishing Cactus

Play the Plus version online on: xem.github.io/2kplus20/plus.html
